com.krobothsoftware.commons.progress

Interface ProgressListener


  • public interface ProgressListener
    The listener interface for receiving progress events. When the progress event occurs, that object's appropriate method is invoked.
    Since:
    SNC 1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getProgressLength()
      Gets progress length
      boolean onProgressUpdate(float value, String task)
      Called when task is incremented.

    • Method Detail

      • onProgressUpdate

        boolean onProgressUpdate(float value,
                       String task)
        Called when task is incremented. If returned value is true, it will tell the current task to stop. Depending on the task, it may not allow to stop.
        Parameters:
        value - progress
        task - current task name
        Returns:
        true, to cancel the task.
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • getProgressLength

        float getProgressLength()
        Gets progress length
        Returns:
        progress length
        Since:
        1.0
